name: Lewis Martins
description:
I am very romantic and I like to pay a lot of attention to my woman. I also like to give her compliments and tell her how nice looking she is and how much I love her.. It is usual for me to do nice things and buy presents for my woman. I am a very good communicator and I love to talk things over. I hate to argue, and I am a very honest and caring man.
Hello my name is martins.I would like to meet a women that is honest and caring with similar interest someone that I could really get to know and know me to share outings and to share life together to be my soul mate to be there for each other to be able to go to each others family functions I have been alone for quite awhile now and would like to meet that special lady to share what life has to other.
